Articles.Content:
*50 kerbin years after 1.0 release......*

"Mission control, this is the *Enterprise*. We are currently falling. This is captain Jebadiah. Control we have major failures on all systems. The warp drive is about to-"

![74918980C898C7D76E27A892F0C1E2495F735469](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128425985061/74918980C898C7D76E27A892F0C1E2495F735469/)

Jeb, Bill and Bob were later recovered. They were assigned to the *Stargazer.* The rest of the crew and the *Enterprise* itself were marked as destroyed.

*5 years later...*

"Captain we are approaching the Jool system."

![E60AAFC4258657350E3B4EA01BE15BC93CD5CB26](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426650228/E60AAFC4258657350E3B4EA01BE15BC93CD5CB26/)

"Sir video feed has been lost! we are entering Laythe's atmosphere!" "try to slow us down" pointing us retrograde sir" "sir detecting some kind of energy pulse... no wait. It's gone" "sir we have splashed down. recommend an EVA to inspect outer damage" "thank you Bill, I will do that myself."

![BDF44B895BAB2B4F9ECFFED6DEF1756C985FCFE9](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426647345/BDF44B895BAB2B4F9ECFFED6DEF1756C985FCFE9/)

![BAF1E40150DA7729E8A9D592F9F4C42965B6D53E](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426650943/BAF1E40150DA7729E8A9D592F9F4C42965B6D53E/)

"Jeb to *Stargazer,* we look ok." "CAPTAIN HULL BREACH IN SHUTTLEBAY. RECOMEND YOU GET IN FAST!"

![980FDDAF4F555AE07531BA4B28F36B17D59FD779](http://cloud-2.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426651348/980FDDAF4F555AE07531BA4B28F36B17D59FD779/)

"CAPTAIN THE WARP DRIVE HAS ACTIVATED ITSELF! BRACE FOR UNPLANED JUMP!"

![50FA52D224819E5D0437A344CA58794BBD534896](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426648248/50FA52D224819E5D0437A344CA58794BBD534896/)

"Bob where are we?" "Jool sir. entering the atmosphere very fast. sir that appears to be a wormhole."

![B208E7147387AF3E1AE1DCEB50DF14FC715E9721](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426649419/B208E7147387AF3E1AE1DCEB50DF14FC715E9721/)

"Bill, where are we?" unknown sir"

*10 years later...*

"this is *Voyageker*, we are approaching eve. unknown anomaly nearby, seems safe to me"

![67F95DA46868DFDA0E910CF05D374E92025BC746](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/539642128426749243/67F95DA46868DFDA0E910CF05D374E92025BC746/)

part 2: EVE coming soon.
